Chap. Forty-Two - The Time to Begin Discipline

     Disobedient Children a Sign of the Last Days.-- One of the signs of the "last days" is the disobedience of children to their parents. And do parents realize their responsibility? Many seem to lose sight of the watch care they should ever have over their children, and suffer them to indulge in evil passions and to disobey them.
